## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv">CallingConv</a> Namespace - This namespace contains an enum with a value for the well-known calling conventions.

### ID {#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed}

<MemberDefinition

LLVM IR allows to use arbitrary numbers as calling convention identifiers.

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">
A set of enums which specify the assigned numeric values for known llvm calling conventions.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="C">
The default llvm calling convention, compatible with C (= 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cabc8e2ee40a84687a9e12fd08784b87ba" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Fast">
Attempts to make calls as fast as possible (e.g (= 8)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca94ec9273479164e4aec1d5d91b71dc85" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Cold">
Attempts to make code in the caller as efficient as possible under the assumption that the call is not commonly executed (= 9)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca8e8dc64aad833bd23d07d3384522575e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GHC">
Used by the Glasgow Haskell Compiler (GHC) (= 10)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca20ddc463f96d806f369d56205ea205f5" />
<EnumerationListItem name="HiPE">
Used by the High-Performance Erlang Compiler (HiPE) (= 11)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca4f42667edde6e9cb80cfae6361e5e76a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AnyReg">
OBSOLETED - Used for stack based JavaScript calls (= 13)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca4eeb29fe27dc20afa4f443765f45f9a5" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PreserveMost">
Used for runtime calls that preserves most registers (= 14)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca9f6ac05d37c2fbf197de42295c23fd6e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PreserveAll">
Used for runtime calls that preserves (almost) all registers (= 15)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca2740493172a4ce246941c8cff95e0f83" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Swift">
Calling convention for Swift (= 16)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca75c7c151466ad7e041e9ed8aa4d5a4bf" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CXX_FAST_TLS">
Used for access functions (= 17)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Tail">
Attemps to make calls as fast as possible while guaranteeing that tail call optimization can always be performed (= 18)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca3f8227288993442d6f4a0bb234c9bc5b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CFGuard_Check">
Special calling convention on Windows for calling the Control Guard <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> ICall funtion (= 19)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cae64b7afe33922c60d78fea3c08697daa" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SwiftTail">
This follows the Swift calling convention in how arguments are passed but guarantees tail calls will be made by making the callee clean up their stack (= 20)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad5385f408f537fc279d485c77d2463ce" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PreserveNone">
Used for runtime calls that preserves none general registers (= 21)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caa901d0f0329620dac86bcfc42f5bfa7e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FirstTargetCC">
This is the start of the target-specific calling conventions, e.g (= 64)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caa88ccf4313b5bc700dec76fd9bc5d40e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_StdCall">
stdcall is mostly used by the Win32 API (= 64)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafde87569738f9e23963e8735f71c33eb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_FastCall">
&#39;fast&#39; analog of X86&#95;StdCall (= 65)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca39e4f9a6d108588930a09d779d4e812f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ARM_APCS">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> Procedure Calling Standard (obsolete, but still used on some targets) (= 66)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca6460922e7050fc0dcff22631e4bc7fdb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ARM_AAPCS">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> Architecture Procedure Calling Standard calling convention (aka <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ada924e855250645672a493841803ff91">EABI</a>) (= 67)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caf5725080d76d25fff371be12a0bf29f4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ARM_AAPCS_VFP">
Same as ARM&#95;AAPCS, but uses hard floating point ABI (= 68)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cac6355efbcea63774ceca1dfa7b237d42" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MSP430_INTR">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msp430">MSP430</a> interrupt routines (= 69)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca97109ccd68cac64fb38dbd24fc4589c6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_ThisCall">
Similar to X86&#95;StdCall (= 70)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cae60325da71f0576e18cc0e5dd7e8afb6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PTX_Kernel">
Call to a PTX kernel. Passes all arguments in parameter space (= 71)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca9b03ea185599539f24eb1f467627c111" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PTX_Device">
Call to a PTX device function (= 72)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caacadec9c4ef27d184bcbbea409afebb2" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SPIR_FUNC">
Used for SPIR non-kernel device functions (= 75)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca9b5e79699935bf721647d44339701860" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SPIR_KERNEL">
Used for SPIR kernel functions (= 76)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad47327c131a0990283111588b89587cb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Intel_OCL_BI">
Used for Intel OpenCL built-ins (= 77)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca10f11fb587acddab17f3ad85eb698fbe" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_64_SysV">
The C convention as specified in the x86-64 supplement to the System V ABI, used on most non-Windows systems (= 78)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cae41511c1ad4197da36cef403f34bac72" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Win64">
The C convention as implemented on Windows/x86-64 and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a> (= 79)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cacfa4cc9bcdaefd5e969c258c994052b9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_VectorCall">
MSVC calling convention that passes vectors and vector aggregates in SSE registers (= 80)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca51dcc0bcdca1d5609b0ec4b43c0d9971" />
<EnumerationListItem name="DUMMY_HHVM">
Placeholders for HHVM calling conventions (deprecated, removed) (= 81)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad710a26c741142a91059eff051990185" />
<EnumerationListItem name="DUMMY_HHVM_C">
 (= 82)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca765508a953368531a7d69d1279e6cfb1" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_INTR">
x86 hardware interrupt context (= 83)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca44deee0b3babbda0be6f27856afaacf9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AVR_INTR">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> interrupt routines (= 84)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca1e000300c2d50f08aa18761448d5860e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AVR_SIGNAL">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> signal routines (= 85)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca8ddc8eecc1584438b45d1d45fc8b87ae" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AVR_BUILTIN">
Used for special <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> rtlib functions which have an &quot;optimized&quot; convention to preserve registers (= 86)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca1a9f243b16678fc294567b72bbe87223" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_VS">
Used for Mesa vertex shaders, or AMDPAL last shader stage before rasterization (vertex shader if tessellation and geometry are not in use, or otherwise copy shader if one is needed) (= 87)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca6f08d1631b96043fe0201973d84e5539" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_GS">
Used for Mesa/AMDPAL geometry shaders (= 88)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca91283117ce67ebdae50cc7730694d8f8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_PS">
Used for Mesa/AMDPAL pixel shaders (= 89)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca16c3e679fa61136bfeb3c5c9b7542d9f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_CS">
Used for Mesa/AMDPAL compute shaders (= 90)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca27a385675142c462571165c839e41aa0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_KERNEL">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> code object kernels (= 91)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafab01b07b85e043c71ad4e2715d22073" />
<EnumerationListItem name="X86_RegCall">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> calling convention used for parameters transfer optimization (= 92)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca5c0f66e45afd7c51f4ee51552d8fb606" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_HS">
Used for Mesa/AMDPAL hull shaders (= tessellation control shaders) (= 93)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca1be5f33158d1f92c70edc260fdd7fc3c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MSP430_BUILTIN">
Used for special <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msp430">MSP430</a> rtlib functions which have an &quot;optimized&quot; convention using additional registers (= 94)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caf2c5be679d7769a9f3e5e308f73a9ff8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_LS">
Used for AMDPAL vertex shader if tessellation is in use (= 95)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad61318e853e529ac703f52a853efa1d1" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_ES">
Used for AMDPAL shader stage before geometry shader if geometry is in use (= 96)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca0e62ecb2c693281fafd77f39b2ddd284" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AArch64_VectorCall">
Used between <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64">AArch64</a> Advanced SIMD functions (= 97)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca300efd85d130657d0d06f0469980bd0f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AArch64_SVE_VectorCall">

For emscripten &#95;&#95;invoke&#95;&#42; functions (= 99)

<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_Gfx">
Used for AMD graphics targets (= 100)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca19e10cbfb07e93e0a7e40cca2faff4c0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="M68k_INTR">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> interrupt routines (= 101)

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca7c23dce1e95fc36e9d2c168f9e036cc7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AArch64_SME_ABI_Support_Routines_PreserveMost_From_X0">
Preserve X0-X13, X19-X29, SP, Z0-Z31, P0-P15 (= 102)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca72069ecfe852db0ea1f10c1549989424" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AArch64_SME_ABI_Support_Routines_PreserveMost_From_X2">
Preserve X2-X15, X19-X29, SP, Z0-Z31, P0-P15 (= 103)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca8d298f27ddf40e08cd5aacea9837784f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_CS_Chain">
Used on AMDGPUs to give the middle-end more control over argument placement (= 104)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca521c5b7a44a8222c814379b57481aec9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AMDGPU_CS_ChainPreserve">
Used on AMDGPUs to give the middle-end more control over argument placement (= 105)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafb7645aeee7db3640bbfdad799b4cfe9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="M68k_RTD">
Used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> rtd-based CC (similar to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a>&#39;s stdcall) (= 106)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cae9c6786f93f1d156d2b40ecc6be438bb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GRAAL">
Used by GraalVM. Two additional registers are reserved (= 107)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4caf80cc3a71c40926e6c35a60ccdc6428e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ARM64EC_Thunk_X64">
Calling convention used in the ARM64EC ABI to implement calls between x64 code and thunks (= 108)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca047fefb5017b2873eb2e88f1a27fb14a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ARM64EC_Thunk_Native">
Calling convention used in the ARM64EC ABI to implement calls between ARM64 code and thunks (= 109)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca12164937f88e72c8b59ca563c70187e0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="RISCV_VectorCall">
Calling convention used for RISC-V V-extension (= 110)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca963e14ac38d6e3b63f8e37085702951c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AArch64_SME_ABI_Support_Routines_PreserveMost_From_X1">
Preserve X1-X15, X19-X29, SP, Z0-Z31, P0-P15 (= 111)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca2f101663d054cffa9c9956f30e7ecf7d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MaxID">
The highest possible <a href="#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>. Must be some 2^k - 1 (= 1023)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
